description: Notes:Tigers. Balls of Twine. Waimea Bay waves. Pyramids. Ohakune Carrots. Some things are meant to be big. Flavours. Aromas. Beer. The list is large but we think it should be bigger. There is a time and place for subtlety, for a delicate touch. This is not one of them. Turning the amplifier up to eleven? Yeah, that’s it.\t

name: Edmund Fitzgerald
full_name: Great Lakes Brewing Company Coffee Infused Edmund Fitzgerald Porter
description: Notes:Robust and complex, our porter is a bittersweet tribute to the legendary freighter's fallen crew--taken too soon when the gales of November came early.37 IBUs\t

name: Black Butte Porter
full_name: Deschutes Brewery Black Butte Porter
description: Notes:Alc. by Vol.: 5.2%IBUs: 30192 calories per 12 oz serving\t

name: Vanilla Porter
full_name: Breckenridge Brewery Vanilla Porter
description: Notes:Deep in the jungles of Papua New Guinea and Madagascar grows the perfect ingredient for an extraordinary Porter brewed in Colorado. Breckenridge Brewery’s Vanilla Porter. An ale that has all the chocolate and roasted nut flavor of a classic Porter, with an enigmatic surprise thrown in for good measure.\t

name: Anchor Porter
full_name: Anchor Brewing Company Anchor Porter
description: Notes:With deep black color, a thick, creamy head, rich chocolate, toffee and coffee flavors, and full-bodied smoothness, Anchor Porter® is the epitome of a handcrafted dark beer.A blend of specially roasted pale, caramel, chocolate, and black malts, along with our top-fermenting yeast, creates complexity without bitterness. The brew is hopped at a high rate, and naturally carbonated. The result is dark in the glass, but surprisingly light on the palate.\t

name: Porter
full_name: Sierra Nevada Brewing Co. Sierra Nevada Porter
description: Notes:Porter is a testament to roasted malts which give it a rich, bittersweet and roasted coffee-like flavor that's a perfect complement to a variety of foods. Before Sierra Nevada was a reality, our nights were spent perfecting homebrews and dreaming of starting a brewery. Back then, one of our favorites was a porter made with homemade malt roasted in our kitchen. Decades later, we still love the rich, bittersweet and roasted malt flavors of that original brew.\t

name: Mocha Porter
full_name: Rogue Ales Mocha Porter
description: Notes:Ruddy brown in color, a bittersweet balance of malt and hops, yet a surprisingly light and refreshing taste.Ingredients: 2-Row, Munich, C120, Chocolate, Black, Kiln Coffee & Rogue Farms Dare™ & Risk™ Malts; Rogue Farms Rebel & Liberty Hops; Free Range Coastal Water & Pacman Yeast.47 IBU\t

name: Everett Porter
full_name: Hill Farmstead Brewery Everett Robust Porter
description: Notes:Everett (1908-1939) was our grandfather’s brother; Hill Farmstead Brewery rests upon the land that was once home to him and his 13 siblings. In his honor, this Porter is crafted from American malted barley, English and German roasted malts, American hops, our ale yeast, and water from our well. It is unfiltered and naturally carbonated. Decadent in its depth, with a complex backbone of chocolate, coffee, and malty sweetness, this is the ale that I dream to have shared with Everett.Pale, Caramel, and Chocolate Malt, Roasted Barley, Columbus hops; Ale Yeast, and our Well Water.\t

name: Samuel Adams Holiday PorterBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
full_name: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Holiday Porter
description: Notes:

name: Coconut Hiwa Porter
full_name: Maui Brewing Co. CoCoNut Porter
description: Notes:Formerly CoCoNut PorterA robust dark ale with hand-toasted coconut & hints of mocha.30 IBU\t

name: Alpha Klaus Christmas (Xmas) Porter
full_name: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Alpha Klaus Christmas (Xmas) Porter
description: Notes:Alpha King’s festive cousin. A big American Christmas Porter brewed with English chocolate malt, Mexican sugar and of course, tons of strange American hops. Cheers!38 IBU\t

name: Pipeline Porter
full_name: Kona Brewing Co. Pipeline Porter
description: Notes:

name: Vanilla Java Porter (VJP)
full_name: Atwater Block Brewery Atwater Vanilla Java Porter
description: Notes:

name: Oatmeal Porter
full_name: Highland Brewing Highland Oatmeal Porter
description: Notes:

name: Cutthroat
full_name: Odell Brewing Company Odell Cutthroat Pale Ale
description: Notes:Not quite a stout but definitely no lightweight, Cutthroat is smooth and robust. Inspired by the classic London porters, we use dark roasted malts to create a deep, rich color and flavor that hint at chocolate and coffee. We named it Cutthroat as our tribute to the Colorado state fish – with its own rich heritage and unmistakable dark coloring. And while we’re big fans of small batches, here’s to the currently threatened Cutthroat population reaching mass quantities.\t

name: Mississippi Mud Black & Tan
full_name: Mississippi Brewing Co. Mississippi Mud Black & Tan
description: Notes:

name: Dead Reckoning Porter
full_name: Tröegs Brewing Company Tröegs Dead Reckoning Porter
description: Notes:

name: Twilight Of The Idols
full_name: Hill Farmstead Brewery Twilight Of The Idols
description: Notes:Twilight of the Idols is our winter porter. We brew Twilight each autumn, with a touch of locally roasted coffee and cinnamon, and age it on a blend of select vanilla beans. Originally conceived with a friend in 2009 while brewing in Denmark, the name of this annual release is inspired by the title of one of the last texts written by one of our philosophical idols, Friedrich Nietzsche.\t

name: Coffeehouse Porter
full_name: Berkshire Brewing Company Inc. Coffeehouse Porter
description: Notes:This rich, dark ale takes BBC’s popular Drayman’s Porter and adds Dean’s Beans organic coffee to the mix, creating an enticing blend of everyone’s favorite beginning and end of day beverages. Robust and aromatic, Coffeehouse Porter is sure to please, no matter what time of day you choose to enjoy it.\t

name: Black Marlin
full_name: Ballast Point Brewing Company Black Marlin Porter
description: Notes:

name: Road Dog
full_name: Flying Dog Brewery Road Dog Porter
description: Notes:

name: New World Porter
full_name: Avery Brewing Company New World Porter
description: Notes:

name: Porter
full_name: Southern Tier Brewing Company Porter
description: Notes:

name: Old Leghumper
full_name: Thirsty Dog Brewing Company Old Leghumper
description: Notes:

name: Mudpuppy
full_name: Central Waters Brewing Company Mudpuppy Porter
description: Notes:

name: Saranac Caramel Porter
full_name: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Caramel Porter
description: Notes:

name: (512) Pecan Porter(512) Brewing Company
full_name: (512) Brewing Company (512) Pecan Porter
description: Notes:Nearly black in color, (512) Pecan Porter is made with Organic US 2-row and Crystal malts along with Baird’s Chocolate and Black malts. Its full body and malty sweetness are balanced with subtle pecan aroma and flavor from locally grown pecans. Yet another true Austin original!\t

name: Saranac Black & Tan
full_name: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Black & Tan
description: Notes:Stout & Lager\t

name: TREAT (Imperial Chocolate Pumpkin Porter)
full_name: Midnight Sun Brewing Co. TREAT (Imperial Chocolate Pumpkin Porter)
description: Notes:Intriguing doses of sweet spices, cocoa nibs and pumpkin transform an exceptional porter into a mesmerizing potion. Pour this tantalizing brew into a snifter and experience its many eccentric nuances, which will delight your taste buds.This is the same award-winning recipe that garnered a GOLD MEDAL at GABF in 2007. Formerly known simply as Imperial Chocolate Pumpkin Porter, we’ve named it T.R.E.A.T.: The Royal Eccentric Ale Treatment.30 IBU\t

name: Great Northern
full_name: Summit Brewing Company Summit Great Northern Porter
description: Notes:Originally named after the London market workers who popularized this brew, we dubbed our Porter with a nod toward the majestic railway stretching from St. Paul to Seattle. Roasted malts offer up coffee notes and lead to a slightly sweet, chocolatey finish. All aboard!\t

name: Porter
full_name: The Duck-Rabbit Craft Brewery Duck-Rabbit Porter
description: Notes:The Duck-Rabbit Porter is very dark in color. This robust ale features a pronounced flavor of roasted grains reminiscent of dark chocolate. Also, we add oats to the grist for a round, silky mouthfeel. The malt is well balanced with hops to make this a fantastic choice for fans of traditional, robust, full-flavored beers. We're confident that you'll love this yummy porter!\t

name: Wasatch Polygamy Porter
full_name: Utah Brewers Cooperative Wasatch Polygamy Porter
description: Notes:

name: Coffee Porter
full_name: Real Ale Brewing Company Shade Grown Coffee Porter
description: Notes:Formerly "Shade Grown Coffee Porter".Born from owner Brad Farbstein’s homebrewing experiments in college — our porter is a rich, robust ale with a dry finish. Fresh, cold-brewed organic fair trade coffee courtesy of Katz Coffee in Houston, TX is added just prior to packaging. Our most popular seasonal release, it’s a whole new way to enjoy your coffee with breakfast, lunch or dinner.A rich, robust porter with a dry finish. Brewed with organic hops, malted barley, and Ruta Maya Shade Grown organic coffee beans from Chiapas, Mexico.\t

name: Thunderstruck Coffee Porter
full_name: Highland Brewing Highland Thunderstruck Coffee Porter
description: Notes:

name: Penn Quarter Porter
full_name: DC Brau Brewing Co. Penn Quarter Porter
description: Notes:Penn Quarter Porter is our first in a line of draft-only limited-release beer, and it's a robust porter! In the way that The Public is on the line between a pale ale and an IPA, this is on the line between a porter and a stout - with chocolate notes and a dry, roasted finish.\t

name: Porter
full_name: Port City Brewing Porter
description: Notes:

name: Coco Loco
full_name: NoDa Brewing Company Coco Loco
description: Notes:Enjoy the blend of chocolate and brown malts in this robust porter with crazy-rich color and ruby highlights. The subtle bitterness of chocolate is balanced by sweet, organic toasted coconut. Perfect to pair with food or just to enjoy alone. So go nuts, you'll be glad you did.

name: Smuttynose Baltic Porter
full_name: Smuttynose Brewing Company Smuttynose Baltic Porter (Big Beer Series)

name: Shipwreck Porter - Bourbon Barrel-Aged
full_name: Arcadia Brewing Company Arcadia Shipwreck Porter
description: Notes:The Baltic-style Porter has a robust malt character and a slight herbal hop bitterness. Aged for 12 months in 10-year-old Kentucky bourbon oak barrels, this alluring dark liquid features appealing undertones of vanilla, oak, cocoa, and coffee. The aging occurs in abandoned mines in Michigan, at a constant temperature of 45F.\t

name: Baltika #6 Porter
full_name: Baltika Breweries Baltika #6 Porter
description: Notes:

name: Baltic Porter
full_name: The Duck-Rabbit Craft Brewery Duck-Rabbit Baltic Porter
description: Notes:The Duck-Rabbit Baltic Porter is deep, rich and velvety soft. A full blooded roasty character with almost no burnt flavor is balanced by complex alcohol notes. Strong (9% alcohol by volume) yet unfailingly subtle, this special brew rewards unhurried attention. Enjoy!\t

name: Smoke
full_name: Surly Brewing Company Smoke
description: Notes:Ebony-hued, Smoke wafts out of the bottle and into your senses, borne on the wings of European traditions, wrapped in American innovation. Lager-brewed, like any true Baltic Porter, with smoked malts from Bamberg, Germany, the home of Rauchbiers, then mellowed by oak-aging. Black malt flavors mesh with notes of raisins, plums, figs and licorice with the subtle smoke on the side, for a complex and luxurious, yet silky smooth drinking experience. It's a sipper at Alc. 8.2% by VOL., but everyone knows you can't have Smoke without fire!\t

name: Sinebrychoff Porter
full_name: Oy Sinebrychoff Ab Sinebrychoff Porter
description: Notes:

name: Black Boss Porter
full_name: BOSS Browar Witnica S.A. Black Boss Porter
description: Notes:

name: Carnegie Porter 5,5%
full_name: Carlsberg Sverige AB Carnegie Porter 5,5%
description: Notes:First introduced in 1836. Strong beers were banned in Sweden 1923-1956.The 5.5 % original recipe was re-introduced in 1985 as a beer fermented with both top and bottom yeast. In 1993, the yeast was changed to a single bottom-fermenting strain. In 2009, the label design and name was changed from "Carnegie Stark-Porter" to "Carnegie Porter".40 IBU\t

name: Topless Wytch
full_name: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Topless Wytch
description: Notes:This strong, Baltic-style Porter has a rich, velvety mouthfeel with notes of bakers chocolate and molasses.\t

name: Grande Cuvée Porter Baltique
full_name: Les Trois Mousquetaires Les Trois Mousquetaires Porter Baltique
description: Notes:Robust dark lager inspired by Porters from around the Baltic Sea region. This beer is luxuriously round with a mild bitterness. The malts contribute flavors of coffee, chocolate, and vanilla. The use of cherry-wood smoked malt provides a subtle hint of smoke.\t

name: Porter
brewery: Nøgne Ø - Det Kompromissløse Bryggeri A/S
full_name: Nøgne Ø - Det Kompromissløse Bryggeri A/S Porter
description: Notes:In this quite dark ale, dark malts provide flavors of coffee and dried fruit. Try with dark chocolate, cheese or red meat dishes.30 IBU\t

name: Smoked Baltic Porter
full_name: Great Divide Brewing Company Smoked Baltic Porter
description: Notes:"this dark lager gets its special twist from a hefty addition of Bamberg smoked malt." Note that Baltic Porters are often fermented with lager yeast.\t

name: Southampton Imperial Baltic Porter
full_name: Southampton Publick House Southampton Imperial Baltic Porter
description: Notes:

name: Double Brown Stout
full_name: Deep Ellum Brewing Company Double Brown Stout
description: Notes:

name: Baltic Porter
full_name: Foothills Brewing Company Foothills Baltic Porter
description: Notes:

name: Tsarina Esra
full_name: Brouwerij De Molen Tsarina Esra Reserva
description: Notes:Tsarina Esra is an imperial porter. A style with his roots in England from many ages ago. It's fullness, it's richness in flavor and it's warming feeling makes it perfect for cold nights. Because of the enduring barrel aging in Ardbeg whisky barrels, this edition is enriched with crazy (really!) peat flavours. It was injected with Brett while in the barrels. Flavor indication: Chocolate, liquorice, funky peaty\t

name: Porter
full_name: Utenos Alus Porter
description: Notes:

name: Porteris
full_name: Aldaris Porteris
description: Notes:

name: Danzig Baltic Porter
full_name: Devils Backbone Brewing Company Danzig Baltic Porter
description: Notes:Danzig, which we named after a Baltic Sea town, isn’t for the faint of heart… or mouth. It’s a well-balanced, full-bodied blend of a strong English porter and a Germanic black lager, making it smooth with a sneaky high ABV. The intense mix of malts and hops provides flavors of chocolate, coffee, and caramelized sugar. No wonder it won Bronze at the World Beer Cup 2018. It’s full-on! Hence the lightning bolt on the pack.Malts: Pilsner, Vienna, Dark Munich, Carafa II, CaraRed, Brown Malt, Chocolate MaltHops: Northern Brewer, TettnangIBU: 28COLOR: Black\t

name: Mørke - Pumpernickel Porter
full_name: Beer Here Mørke - Pumpernickel Porter
description: Notes:Brewed in collaboration with Shelton Brothers. Lots of rye malt and spices inspired by the dark German bread.\t

name: Akevitt
full_name: HaandBryggeriet Akevitt Porter (Barrel-Aged Porter)
description: Notes:Matured on Aquavit casks.\t

name: Bourbon Barrel Aged Shaman's Porter
full_name: Atwater Block Brewery Atwater Bourbon Barrel Aged Shaman's Porter
description: Notes:

name: Baltic Porter
full_name: Uncommon Brewers Baltic Porter
description: Notes:

name: Grand Imperial Porter
full_name: Browar Amber Grand Imperial Porter
description: Notes:

name: Kurofune Porter
full_name: Baird Brewing Company / Fishmarket Taproom Kurofune Porter
description: Notes:

name: Fear And Trembling (Cabernet/Bourbon Blend)
full_name: Hill Farmstead Brewery Fear And Trembling (Cabernet/Bourbon Blend)
description: Notes:Fear and Trembling is Hill Farmstead’s first collaboration – a Baltic Porter brewed with malt that was hand smoked over maple wood by our Danish friend, and former colleague, Anders Kissmeyer. This bottled version was blended from beer aged in both American Oak Cabernet barrels and Bourbon barrels. As a student of philosophy and former resident of Copenhagen, it is fitting that our brewer named our first collaboration after Denmark’s great thinker: Søren Kierkegaard. All three contemplated absurdity, faith, and salvation while wandering the shores of the Baltic Sea…“…continue to work out your salvation with fear and trembling…”\t

name: Alice Porter
full_name: BrewDog Alice Porter
description: Notes:Weighing in at 5.2% ABV, Alice Porter hides a huge complexity behind her modest strength. Roasty and smooth with fruity, rich coffee character. Alice Porter takes a sudden twist in an unexpected direction; a blend of hops that add a light, balancing citrusy twist and a subtle spiciness. Alice Porter is the first of our 2105 seasonal brews.\t

name: Hoogstraten Poorter
full_name: Brouwerij Sterkens N.V. Hoogstraten Poorter
description: Notes:

name: Limfjordsporter
full_name: Thisted Bryghus Limfjordsporter
description: Notes:Brewed with liquorice. The recipe was developed during the 70's at the Urban brewery in Aalborg. Thisted bought the name, and the production restarted in 1997.\t

name: Fuller's London Porter
full_name: Fuller Smith & Turner PLC Fuller's London Porter
description: Notes:Fuller's London Porter is an award-winning example of this historic English style; smooth and creamy with delicious chocolate and coffee flavors derived from the roasted malt.The griffin Brewery is Chiswick, London, has brewing fine ales since 1654.The Fuller, Smith & Turner partnership dating back to 1845, brews an excellent range of award-winning beers, many of which are available in the U.S. including London Pride pale ale and the Old's original ESB.\t

name: Old Engine Oil Black Ale
full_name: Harviestoun Brewery Ltd. Old Engine Oil
description: Notes:Legend has it that Old Engine Oil was dedicated to our Head Brewer’s love of classic cars. But it’s the thick, dark, chocolatey viscosity that reveals the real inspiration behind the name.\t

name: Bully! Porter
full_name: Boulevard Brewing Co. Bully! Porter
description: Notes:The intense flavors of dark-roasted malt in Boulevard’s rendition of the classic English porter are perfectly balanced by a generous and complex hop character. Bully! Porter’s robust nature makes it the ideal companion to a variety of foods, from seafood to chocolate.49 IBU\t

name: Samuel Adams Honey PorterBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
full_name: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Honey Porter
description: Notes:

name: People's Porter
full_name: Foothills Brewing Company People's Porter
description: Notes:People's Porter is a robust English-style brew with a dark, ruby hue. Complex chocolate, caramel and toffee notes give way to an herbal bitterness, finishing with a pleasant hint of espresso.42 IBU\t

name: Washington's Porter
full_name: Yards Brewing Co. General Washington's Tavern Porter
description: Notes:Formerly General Washington's Tavern PorterDetailed in a letter from the General to his officers during the war, Washington’s recipe employed molasses to aid fermentation and give rich caramel notes to this robust, roasty ale. The recipe reflected his admiration for Philadelphia-style porters, especially those brewed by Robert Hare (whose original brewery stood just blocks from where ours is now). Our Tavern Porter, inspired by Washington’s, is dark, smooth, and complex with just a hint of dried fruit in the finish.\t

name: Porter
full_name: Mayflower Brewing Company Mayflower Porter
description: Notes:Taking its cues from “Three Threads”, a bartender’s blend of three distinct ales, Porter became the beer of choice for 18th-century Londoners. Mayflower Porter embraces this history. This complex brew is smooth and full-flavored with notes of roasted coffee beans and bittersweet chocolate that will warm the palate all year long. Mayflower Porter is a rich, complex brew that is smooth and full-flavored. Five varieties of malted barley provide notes of roasted coffee beans and bittersweet chocolate with a hint of smokiness.\t

name: Old-Style Porter
full_name: St. Peter's Brewery Co Ltd St. Peter's Old-Style Porter
description: Notes:A blend of a mature and young ale creates a porter of traditional character that’s dark cherry in colour and complex in taste. Aromas of liquorice, rum, raisin and chocolate with hints of coffee are in abundance in this full-bodied, warming ale.\t

name: Coffee Porter
full_name: Meantime Brewing Company Limited Coffee Porter
description: Notes:Whilst we would not recommend having this at breakfast with your bacon and eggs, our Coffee Beer is made with real coffee and has a caffeine hit to match. The natural flavors of the beans selected and hand roasted by our friends at the Union Coffee Roasters go well with the roast barley in the beer to give a silky-smooth drink with distinct chocolate and vanilla notes.\t

name: Zwet.Be
full_name: Brouwerij Drie Fonteinen Zwet.Be
description: Notes:A porter brewed with lambic yeast.\t

name: Santa's Butt
full_name: Ridgeway Brewing Santa's Butt
description: Notes:

name: London Porter
full_name: Meantime Brewing Company Limited London Porter
description: Notes:Porter was the great London beer style of the 18th and 19th centuries, when the city was revered as both the brewing capital and trading hub of the world. Named after the legions of porters in her docks, streets and markets who drank this powerful beer to slake their thirst, Meantime London Porter is a classic interpretation of this complex dark beer style.Wonderful with mature cheese, beef, lamb, or as traditionally served, with oysters.\t

name: Boxcarr Pumpkin Porter
full_name: Starr Hill Brewery Box Car Pumpkin Porter
description: Notes:

name: Porter
full_name: Green Man Brewery Green Man Porter
description: Notes:Dark, full-bodied, and rich in flavor, Green Man Porter is wonderfully easy to drink. It offers a creamy, smooth mouthfeel and finishes with distinctive chocolate notes. This traditionally crafted, award-winning British-style Porter, like a true rock star, enjoys a legendary following.\t

name: Sly Rye Porter
full_name: Yazoo Brewing Company Sly Rye Porter
description: Notes:A rich, chocolaty English Porter with a clean finish. We use the finest floor-malted Maris Otter malts from England, the same malts used for the best single-malt scotch. A portion of malted rye gives a spicy, slightly dry finish.28 IBU\t

name: Publican Porter (Imperial London Porter)
full_name: Short's Brewing Company Short's Publican Porter (Imperial London Porter)
description: Notes:A Robust Porter.\t

name: Geary's London Porter
full_name: D.L. Geary Brewing Company Geary's London Style Porter
description: Notes:Faithfully recreated by Geary’s, this classic English style has a deep mahogany color and a restrained roasted malt flavor. The result is rich and complex, yet smooth and refreshing. Original gravity - 1045; alcohol by volume - 4.2%; two row English malt (pale, crystal, chocolate and black); Cascade, Willamette and Golding hops.\t

name: Original Flag Porter
full_name: Darwin Brewery Ltd. Original Flag Porter
description: Notes:

name: Black Duck Porter
full_name: Greenport Harbor Brewing Company Black Duck Porter
description: Notes:A black ale that puts the flavor of the malt front and center. It has a mild hop character that balances strong notes of cocoa and hints of coffee. A full-bodied roasty treat that finishes dry. Pairs well with chocolate, BBQ, as well as fresh shellfish.\t

name: Kennebunkport Porter
full_name: Federal Jack's Restaurant & Brew Pub Kennebunkport Porter
description: Notes:

name: Contorter
full_name: Ale Asylum Contorter
description: Notes:Our porter is dark in color yet soft on the palate. English chocolate malts give it a complex, rich flavor wrapped in a silky smooth finish.\t

name: Entire Butt English Porter
full_name: Salopian Brewing Company Ltd Entire Butt English Porter
description: Notes:Historically the term used to describe a porter blended from a variety of ales, entire butt uses 14 different malts and 3 hops to recreate this forgotten style of porter. The beer is black/brown with a crisp white head and is distinctly vinuous. It has little hop character as essentially the flavour is derived from the malts. Malts used: pale Maris Otter, lager, wheat, pale crystal, dark crystal, dark chocolate, pale chocolate, black, roasted barley, caramalt, torrified wheat, amber malt, brown malt and malted oats.\t

name: Porter
full_name: St. George Brewing Company, The Porter
description: Notes:

name: Benchwarmer Porter
full_name: Cooperstown Brewing Company Benchwarmer Porter
description: Notes:

name: Black Wych
full_name: Wychwood Brewery Company Ltd Black Wych
description: Notes:BLACK WYCH A Dark Mysterious Spellbinding PorterBLACK WYCH spellbinding porter , The Black Wych has cast her spell , start with a measure of alluring rich dark malt & allow the bitterness to creep in. This silkily smooth porter is a force to be reckoned with.Brewed primarily for export.\t

name: Vanilla Porter
full_name: Mill Street Brew Pub Mill Street Vanilla Porter
description: Notes:

name: Old Growler
full_name: Nethergate Brewery Co. Ltd. Old Growler
description: Notes:

name: Longfellow
full_name: Shipyard Brewing Co. Longfellow Winter Ale
description: Notes:

name: Rickard's Dark
full_name: Molson Coors Canada Rickard's Dark
description: Notes:Brewed in the style of English porters, Rickard's Dark is creamy with a smooth finish that holds just a hint of pure Quebec maple syrup.\t

name: Shoo-Fly Pie Porter
full_name: Lancaster Brewing Company Porter
description: Notes:Made with eight different malts, four types of hops and a touch of Lancaster County molasses, this tasty brew has a rich brown hue with a medium to full body flavor.\t

name: Duke Of Winship
full_name: Middle Ages Brewing Co., Ltd. Duke Of Winship
description: Notes:"Scotch Porter"A sensual dark brew with the softness of a Scotch ale crafted with the malt make-up of an English porter.\t

name: Midnight Sun
full_name: Williams Brothers Brewing Company Midnight Sun
description: Notes:

name: Longboat Chocolate Porter
full_name: Phillips Brewing Company Longboat Double Chocolate Porter
description: Notes:Classic Pairings in History: Stevie Wonder & Paul McCartney Super Dave Osborne & Mr. Fuji Cheddar cheese & pickles Bob & Doug McKenzie Mork & Mindy Bonnie & Clyde Chocolate & Beer!!! We'd say that Longboat is a classic chocolate porter, but lets face it, who's ever heard of a chocolate porter? It is, however, a rich dark ale, with a distinctive chocolate finish. Comes in a 650mL bottle, cause 341mL just isn't enough!\t

name: Busted Knuckle Ale
full_name: Big Woods Brewing Co. Busted Knuckle Red Ale
description: Notes:This is our signature ale. Busted Knuckle is a hybrid ale, most similar to a “light” porter. We say “light” because, while it does have complexity, it is also a very smooth and approachable beer.\t

name: Old Slug Porter
full_name: RCH Brewery Old Slug Porter
description: Notes:In the old brewery we had a problem with slugs getting into the brewery. As the beer leaves a trail down the glass as you drink it like a slug, that's how the beer was named. A delicious traditional porter with a full bodied taste of chocolate, coffee, blackcurrant and black cherry with a good aroma. A near black colour with a good white head when served through a tight sparkler.\t

name: Pigs Ass Porter
full_name: Harvest Moon Brewery Pigs Ass Porter
description: Notes:First brewed by Harvest Moon in 1997, this beer is a multiple award-winning dark ale brewed in the Burton, England style owing to the similarity of water chemistry in Belt compared to this classic porter producing area in England. Plenty of body without a sharp bite, this ale is brewed with pale, caramel, chocolate and black malts to create a creamy, smooth, roasted, slightly chocolate tasting ale with a touch of hops in the finish. This ale can be enjoyed in every season and is best when served cool, not cold. And why the name? While drinking this new brew one evening back in 1997, the local hog farmer showed up to collect our spent mash and we that what could be better for fattening pigs?\t

name: Anvil Porter
full_name: French Broad Brewing Co. Anvil Porter
description: Notes:

name: Victory At Sea - Coffee And Vanilla
full_name: Ballast Point Brewing Company Victory At Sea Coffee Vanilla Imperial Porter
description: Notes:Our Victory at Sea Imperial Porter is a bold, smooth brew with just the right amount of sweetness. We infused this robust porter with whole vanilla beans and San Diego’s own Caffe Calabria coffee beans. The subtle roasted notes and minimal acidity of the cold brewed coffee, balances perfectly with the sweet caramel undertones of the malt, creating a winning combination for your palate.\t

name: Gonzo
full_name: Flying Dog Brewery Gonzo Imperial Porter
description: Notes:Too weird to live, too rare to die, Gonzo Imperial Porter is bold and forceful, like the man it was brewed to honor – Dr. Hunter S. Thompson. Complex layers of roasted chocolate, coffee, brown sugar, and vanilla malt flavors are balanced with a one-of-a-kind hop bite that hits you like a homemade firecracker. Buy the ticket and take the ride by pairing this rich and creamy porter with blue cheeses, smoked meats, BBQ, chili, chocolate and coffee desserts. Best shared with your closest circle of friends— real or hallucinated.Malts: Caramel, Black, ChocolateHops: Northern Brewer, CascadeYeas: American Ale, English AleIBU: 85ABV varies\t

name: Birth Of Tragedy
full_name: Hill Farmstead Brewery Birth Of Tragedy
description: Notes:Birth of Tragedy is the imperial and oak barrel-aged version of our annual winter porter, Twilight of the Idols. Brewed with locally roasted coffee and Vermont honey, we age this beer for a year in personally selected bourbon barrels from our favorite distilleries.\t

name: Gonzo - Barrel-Aged
full_name: Flying Dog Brewery Barrel-Aged Gonzo Imperial Porter
description: Notes:Aged for months in oak whiskey barrels from A. Smith Bowman, our deep and dark Gonzo gets even more mysterious with notes of vanilla and whiskey warmth.Malts: Caramel, Black, ChocolateHops: Northern Brewer, CascadeYeast: American Ale and English Ale85 IBU\t

name: Mogli
full_name: Caldera Brewing Company Mogli
description: Notes:'Oak Aged Imperial Porter Brewed with Chocolate'Caldera Kettle SeriesJune 2011 - first release in waxed 22 oz. bottles\t

name: The Devil Made Me Do It!
full_name: Tyranena Brewing Company The Devil Made Me Do It! Coffee Imperial Oatmeal Porter
description: Notes:Coffee beans used are a blend of Costa Rican and Sumatran from Berres Brothers Coffee Roasters in Watertown, Wi.\t

name: Dirty Old Man Imperial Rye Porter
full_name: Tyranena Brewing Company Dirty Old Man Imperial Rye Porter
description: Notes:Aged in Rye Whiskey barrels.\t
